summary: This bill, the Mitigating Electronic Access Losses for Students Act of 2025 (MEALS Act of 2025), amends the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to address the theft of Summer EBT benefits. It mandates the Secretary to issue guidance and regulations for State agencies and Tribal organizations participating in the program, focusing on measures to prevent and detect benefit theft (card skimming, cloning, etc.)  It also requires these entities to implement procedures for replacing stolen benefits for eligible households. The bill includes deadlines for reporting, plan submissions and requires a report from the Comptroller General on related security risks.
